criteria: Ability to identify independent and dependent variables in real-world scenarios.
Skill in writing equations to represent the relationship between dependent and independent variables.
Ability to analyze the relationship between variables using graphs and tables.
Capacity to relate graphs and tables to the corresponding equation.
descriptions: Student cannot identify either independent or dependent variables.
Student can identify either the independent OR the dependent variable, but not both.
Student can identify both variables, but with some difficulty or minor inaccuracies.
Student can accurately identify independent and dependent variables in most real-world scenarios.
Student can consistently and accurately identify independent and dependent variables in complex real-world scenarios.
Student demonstrates a deep understanding of independent and dependent variables, accurately identifying them in novel and complex situations, and can explain their relationship effectively.
Student cannot write an equation to represent the relationship.
Student attempts to write an equation, but it is incorrect or incomplete.
Student can write a basic equation, but struggles with more complex relationships.
Student can write equations to represent most relationships, but may make minor errors.
Student can accurately write equations to represent the relationship between variables in a variety of scenarios.
Student demonstrates mastery in writing equations, including complex relationships, and can explain the equation's meaning in context.
Student cannot analyze the relationship using graphs or tables.
Student attempts to analyze the relationship, but struggles to interpret the data.
Student can analyze basic relationships using graphs and tables, but struggles with more complex scenarios.
Student can analyze most relationships accurately using graphs and tables.
Student can analyze complex relationships accurately using graphs and tables, and can identify trends.
Student demonstrates a deep understanding of graphical and tabular analysis, accurately interpreting complex relationships and identifying subtle trends with insightful explanations.
Student cannot relate graphs and tables to the equation.
Student attempts to relate graphs and tables, but struggles to make connections.
Student can relate basic graphs and tables to the equation, but struggles with more complex scenarios.
Student can accurately relate most graphs and tables to the equation.
Student can accurately relate complex graphs and tables to the equation, and can explain the connections.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the connections between graphs, tables, and equations, providing insightful explanations and accurately predicting outcomes.
